\documentclass{article}
\RequirePackage{luafonts}
%
\special{mapline: ptmr8r Times-Italic <8r.enc <ptmri8a.pfb " TeXBase1Encoding ReEncodeFont "}
\font\fakedrm=ptmr8r %% replaced by italic
\special{mapline: +ptmri8r Times-Bold <8r.enc <ptmb8a.pfb " TeXBase1Encoding ReEncodeFont "} %% generates warning
\special{mapline: foo Times-BoldItalic <8r.enc <ptmbi8a.pfb " TeXBase1Encoding ReEncodeFont "}
\font\foo=foo
%
\begin{document}

{fakedrm: \fakedrm testas}

{it:\textit{test}}
 
{foo:\foo test}

\end{document}
